title: Bi-Weekly Career and Hiring Discussion Thread
selftext:
Hello r/india! If you need any suggestions/help regarding your career, ask here. If your company is hiring or if you are looking for a job, then post here.

**If You or Your Company is Hiring:**

1. Name of the company
2. Location
3. Requirements
4. Preferred way of contacting you

**If You are looking to get hired**

1. Your skillset/experience
2. Portfolio (if any/applicable)
3. Location
4. Preferred way of contacting you

Please do not mention your emails. You can/should prefer to take conversation forward in PMs instead to avoid any privacy mishaps.

Do follow up here with your experience. Did you get a job or hire someone successfully via these threads? Your feedback helps!

**Career Thread is posted every two weeks on Thursday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Career+and+Hiring+thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/osdztmrfx8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=dab56a83877ffe7dc6fd93767a8f63e9c366e592
comments: If anyone has questions about MBA in the US I would be happy to answer.

For someone who has done MBA in India and is earning around 30L per annum (2 yr exp), is it worth it? The equivalent salary for my role in my company in US is around 150k.

Also working for a global corp, so there are opportunities to go outside India.

The reason I'm asking this is that I see some of my college seniors go out still. 

Also, what advantage does a US MBA provide compared to elite European MBA (INSEAD, LBS, Oxford, Cambridge)? What's the case for choosing INSEAD rather than a T15 in US? (apart from 1 yr vs 2 yr)

We are a small team working in Financial domain based out of Gurugram. We are hiring for roles across tech & content.

**Tech** :
Frontend/Backend/Mobile

If you are someone who have some experience in building websites/mobile apps or backend services in Javscript or Python then DM me. (freshers are welcome)

**Content** : 

- SEO Manager

- Research Analyst ( Mutual Funds / Stocks )

Does anyone know how much Google pays a person who has around 4.5 years experience who is making 18lpa in a different company. 

Either Hyderabad or Bangalore office

Lots of good questions. 

In my opinion is not worth doing another mba - good schools won’t particularly entertain it unless the candidate has some other exceptional qualities in their resume. 


Elite European MBAs have cachet in the US - I personally know people/friends that have MBAs from INSEAD and LBS that are working in FAANG or investment banks. That said US MBAs even from non elite schools have cachet all over the US and can help in securing good jobs and immigrating here.

I'm working in customer services from last 5 yrs. I've enhanced my speaking nd writing skills , and got placed in ome of the biggest giant in this field that offers good salary. But issue is that it is a 200 yrs old company that falls under fortune 500. They seems to promote people with a decade of experience as there's alot of competition. Also, there's no outside scope for someone who's in customer services as salaries are too low. 

I don't know how to proceed further from this point. I'm ready to learn new skill, but I just don't know the direction. I love to write nd interact with people. Any genuine suggestion pls.

Looking to get hired:  
  
Skillset & experience: Technical writer and Junior Business Analyst. Technical documentation. Have 1 year of corporate experience. Also good with SEO writing, technical article writing.  
  
Two year of job gap, though I'm open to learning. I'm curious and good at what i do.  
  
Location: Pune, Maharashtra. Bangalore. Gujarat. Or Remote  
  
Preferred way of contact: DM  
  
Any other suggestions are welcome.
Hi. Do you have knowledge/experience of writing content for blockchain or crypto?

We are a blockchain dev company. 
Looking for 
1. MERN Stack developers 
2. Blockchain developers 
3. HR manager 
4. Crypto Trader/Analyst
And various other profiles. 

WFH currently. Office in Delhi/NCR. 

Please DM if interested.

If you can speak Italian, Russian, or Arabic and interested in a job in telesales, cold calling, lead generation, please DM me. Job location: Manesar (near Gurugram). With a global manufacturer of building material. Salary: 8-10 LPA.

Also looking for a Regional Manager for the same company to be based in Malaysia. Must have industry experience in Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia and neighboring countries.

Do you think MBA is worth doing if someone can't clear CAT? And just gets an MBA in a private college by just paying for it.  


Also do you think HR has scope? I know its not a field where I'll see fast growth, but is it good if I'm good at conflict resolution, and I'm cool headed, and I like working with people? And I like following rules?   


I'm in 12th right now.  


Also does it matter if I do BA then MBA, rather than BBA and MBA to employers? Thank you!
